title: Software Development Practical Skills Enhancement: Sports and Physical Education Design Using Constraint-Based Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Students can effectively apply motor skills by analyzing the interaction of task, environmental, and performer constraints in sports contexts.
Students can independently explore optimal movement patterns by manipulating various constraints through VR simulations.
Students can periodically review and improve their skill performance processes through formative assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
